title: The Picnic
brief_description: A small boy kept in after school finds a notice about a girls’ picnic and shows it to the boys who plan to gate crash. The girls realise this and prepare sandwiches with shoe nugget and drinks with paint. When the boys raid the lunch bags they receive a nasty shock.
